system.description: You create a quasi-real, illusory duplicate of yourself from the Plane of Shadow. The image looks, sounds, and smells like you but is intangible. It mimics your actions unless you direct it otherwise (move action). You can see and hear through it; while using its senses your body is blinded and deafened. Spells with range touch or greater can originate from the image; the image can't cast spells on itself except illusions. You must maintain line of effect; dimension door, teleport, plane shift, or similar breaks the spell.

components.materialDescription: A small replica of you (a doll), 5 gp to create.
